name: Death Loop (KixStart)
description:
Important!

Play with fullscreen for a better experience

Description

Death loop is a game where you traverse the levels by dying to reach the end. This is still a very early game. It will be updated and polished more in the future.

Assets

All assets were made by myself. The music was made with beepbox and the sprites are made with photoshop and piskel.

PC Only (Mobile Later).
